name: error-sound-extension
description: Play a custom sound when compilation or terminal/server errors occur.

errorSound.filePath.description: Path to the sound file, relative to the first workspace folder (e.g. assets/error.wav).

errorSound.enableDiagnostics.description: Play the sound when files gain new diagnostics with severity Error.

errorSound.enableTerminal.description: Play the sound when terminal output matches error-like patterns.

errorSound.terminalPatterns.description: Regular expression patterns (strings) used to detect error-like lines in terminal output.
